title: Dev Server Target
description:
Dev Server target options for Build Facade.

 Dev Server 目标的构建选项。

browserTarget.description:
A browser builder target to serve in the format of `project:target[:configuration]`. You can also pass in more than one configuration name as a comma-separated list. Example: `project:target:production,staging`.

一个浏览器构建器目标，用来以 `project:target[:configuration]` 的格式启动开发服务器。你还可以传入逗号分隔的多个配置名称列表。例如：`project:target:production,staging`。

port.description:
Port to listen on.

要监听的端口。

host.description:
Host to listen on.

要监听的主机。

proxyConfig.description:
Proxy configuration file.

代理配置文件。

ssl.description:
Serve using HTTPS.

用 HTTPS 方式提供服务。

sslKey.description:
SSL key to use for serving HTTPS.

用于提供 HTTPS 服务的 SSL 密钥。

sslCert.description:
SSL certificate to use for serving HTTPS.

用于提供 HTTPS 服务的 SSL 证书。

headers.description:
Custom HTTP headers to be added to all responses.

将自定义 HTTP 标头添加到所有响应中。

open.description:
Opens the url in default browser.

在默认浏览器中打开此 URL。

verbose.description:
Adds more details to output logging.

将更多详细信息添加到输出日志记录。

liveReload.description:
Whether to reload the page on change, using live-reload.

是否要利用实时重载在更改时刷新页面。

publicHost.description:
The URL that the browser client (or live-reload client, if enabled) should use to connect to the development server. Use for a complex dev server setup, such as one with reverse proxies.

浏览器客户端（或实时重载客户端，如果启用）用于连接开发服务器的 URL。用于复杂的开发服务器设置，例如带有反向代理的服务器。

allowedHosts.description:
List of hosts that are allowed to access the dev server.

允许访问开发服务器的主机列表。

servePath.description:
The pathname where the app will be served.

要在其中启动应用服务器的路径名。

disableHostCheck.description:
Don't verify connected clients are part of allowed hosts.

不要验证连接的客户端是否属于允许的主机。

hmr.description:
Enable hot module replacement.

启用模块热替换。

watch.description:
Rebuild on change.

在更改时重建。

hmrWarning.description:
Show a warning when the --hmr option is enabled.

启用 --hmr 选项时显示警告。
hmrWarning.x-deprecated:
No longer has an effect.

已经不起作用了。

servePathDefaultWarning.description:
Show a warning when deploy-url/base-href use unsupported serve path values.

当 deploy-url/base-href 使用了不受支持的服务路径时，显示警告。
servePathDefaultWarning.x-deprecated:
No longer has an effect.

已经不起作用了。

optimization.description:
Enables optimization of the build output. Including minification of scripts and styles, tree-shaking, dead-code elimination, tree-shaking and fonts inlining. For more information, see https://angular.io/guide/workspace-config#optimization-configuration.

启用构建输出的优化。包括脚本和样式的最小化、摇树优化、消除死代码和内联字体等。欲知详情，请参阅</guide/workspace-config#optimization-configuration>。

scripts.description:
Enables optimization of the scripts output.

启用脚本输出的优化。

styles.description:
Enables optimization of the styles output.

启用样式输出的优化。

optimization.x-deprecated:
Use the "optimization" option in the browser builder instead.

使用 browser 构建器中的 "optimization" 选项代替。

aot.description:
Build using Ahead of Time compilation.

使用预先（AOT）编译进行构建。
aot.x-deprecated:
Use the "aot" option in the browser builder instead.

使用 browser 构建器中的 "aot" 选项代替。

sourceMap.description:
Output source maps for scripts and styles. For more information, see https://angular.io/guide/workspace-config#source-map-configuration.

输出脚本和样式的源码映射信息。欲知详情，请参阅</guide/workspace-config#source-map-configuration>。

scripts.description:
Output source maps for all scripts.

输出所有脚本的源码映射信息。

styles.description:
Output source maps for all styles.

输出所有样式的源码映射信息。

hidden.description:
Output source maps used for error reporting tools.

输出用于错误报告工具的源码映射信息。

vendor.description:
Resolve vendor packages source maps.

是否解析来自供应商包的源码映射信息。

sourceMap.x-deprecated:
Use the "sourceMap" option in the browser builder instead.

使用 browser 构建器中的 "sourceMap" 代替。

vendorChunk.description:
Generate a seperate bundle containing only vendor libraries. This option should only used for development.

生成仅包含供应商库的单独捆绑包。此选项只能用于开发阶段。
vendorChunk.x-deprecated:
Use the "vendorChunk" option in the browser builder instead.

使用 browser 构建器中的 "vendorChunk" 代替。

commonChunk.description:
Generate a seperate bundle containing code used across multiple bundles.

生成一个单独的捆绑包，其中包含跨多个捆绑包使用的代码。
commonChunk.x-deprecated:
Use the "commonChunk" option in the browser builder instead.

使用 browser 构建器中的 "commonChunk" 代替。

baseHref.description:
Base url for the application being built.

所构建的应用程序的 base URL。
baseHref.x-deprecated:
Use the "baseHref" option in the browser builder instead.

使用 browser 构建器中的 "baseHref" 代替。

deployUrl.description:
URL where files will be deployed.

这些文件将部署到的 URL。
deployUrl.x-deprecated:
Use the "deployUrl" option in the browser builder instead.

使用 browser 构建器中的 "deployUrl" 代替。

progress.description:
Log progress to the console while building.

在构建时将进度记录到控制台。
progress.x-deprecated:
Use the "progress" option in the browser builder instead.

使用 browser 构建器中的 "progress" 代替。

poll.description:
Enable and define the file watching poll time period in milliseconds.

启用轮询并定义毫秒为单位的轮询间隔。
